title: Gwyneth Paltrow's Banana Republic blazer is the chicest fall wardrobe essential
text:
It's no secret Gwyneth Paltrow has mastered the art of minimal chic.

With a stellar wardrobe of perfectly curated basics -- blazers, trousers and t-shirts-- the Goop founder is constantly giving us everyday wearable inspiration with a hint of modern menswear.

Her latest notable outfit came when the 46-year-old mom hosted a Goop podcast event in Beverly Hills alongside Kerry Washington. For the occasion, Paltrow wore suited separates that included white cropped flare jeans and a brown tattersall plaid blazer from Banana Republic.

The chic jacket features tailored shoulders and double-breasted closure for the ultimate power-dressing vibe. Ranging in sizes 0 to 20, the under-$200 blazer is fully lined with a stretch for comfortability.

he piece works for a variety of occasions: Pair it with jeans and a white tee or step into the boardroom with the matching pants. Oh and did we mention, Banana Republic is having a big sale? Like, up to 60% off big! Shop Gwyneth's jacket below and save on other fall styles along the way. Happy shopping!



Banana Republic Slim Double-Breasted Plaid Blazer, $199
description: The 46-year-old mom recently hosted a Goop podcast event in Beverly Hills alongside Kerry Washington.
